Good torrent, just needs some explanation for noobs such as myself.

1. Download torrent
2. Click on one of the rar files, extract to rld-bf2. This is the .iso image to mount with daemontools or similar.
3. Extract the crack folder from rld-bf2. Run the keygen to get a product key.
4. Play mounted image to install.
5. Copy battlefrontII (clonetrooper head) file to your installed folder. (C:\Program Files\LucasArts\Star Wars Battlefront II\GameData by default)
6. Run game, have fun.
